name: To Infinity | Edition by Pastel Papi

metadata.name: to infinity
metadata.description:
I’m in love with the idea 
of falling in love:

the idea that one day you meet someone  
your heart gets lit with a fire 
that won’t stop burning 
until a stranger of a human 
becomes your new home. 

The feeling that your future 
sounds like footsteps 
echoing in tandem  
your lover in your stride. 

I love everything about love. 

I love hearing about the love my friends feel. 

I love watching strangers hold hands at sunset. 

I love old,  married couples 
that go to the same diner for breakfast every Sunday 
asking for the extra packet of sugar. 
They know how their lover takes their coffee:  
light cream and extra sweet. 

I love the idea of running through a rain storm 
holding your lover’s hand, 
laughing 
becoming the water that drenches every inch of you. 

I’m a hopeless romantic ;  
the world is too beautiful not to be.

attributes.value: 100-400mm F5-6.3 DG OS HSM | Contemporary 017 f/6.2
